abstract.t: This document discusses types of Instance Information to be used in conjunction with the Semantic Definition Format (SDF) for Data and Interactions of Things (draft-ietf-asdf-sdf) and will ultimately define Representation Formats for them as well as ways to use SDF Models to describe them. // The present revision –05 is intended as input for IETF 123, with a // few observations from the Hackathon addressed and this status // paragraph updated.
